# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/__init__.py
@source-hash: 751c6320bf926c55
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:59:55Z

## Primary Purpose
This is the main entry point for the Rich library (pip vendored version), providing a global console interface and convenient wrapper functions for rich text terminal output. Acts as a fa√ßade pattern over the more complex Console class.

## Key Functions & Architecture

### Global Console Management
- `get_console()` (L23-36): Lazy singleton factory for global Console instance. Creates Console on first access, stores in `_console` module variable (L14).
- `reconfigure(*args, **kwargs)` (L39-50): Replaces global console configuration by creating new Console and copying its __dict__ to existing instance.

### Public API Functions
- `print(*objects, ...)` (L53-74): Drop-in replacement for built-in print() with Rich formatting. Uses global console for stdout, creates new Console for custom file parameter.
- `print_json(json=None, *, data=None, ...)` (L77-117): Pretty-prints JSON with syntax highlighting. Delegates to Console.print_json() with comprehensive JSON serialization options.
- `inspect(obj, *, console=None, ...)` (L120-173): Object introspection utility with configurable detail levels. Special case handling for self-inspection (L159). Uses pip._vendor.rich._inspect.Inspect class.

## Dependencies & Relationships
- Core dependency: `.console.Console` (lazy imported)
- Extension support: `._extension.load_ipython_extension` (L6)
- Introspection: `pip._vendor.rich._inspect.Inspect` (L156)
- Import path handling: Uses `_IMPORT_CWD` (L17-20) with FileNotFoundError safety

## Notable Patterns
- Lazy imports throughout to avoid circular dependencies
- Global singleton pattern with reconfiguration support
- TYPE_CHECKING guards for type hints without runtime imports (L10-11)
- Graceful CWD handling for deleted directories (L18-19)
- Special case logic for inspect() self-reference (L158-165)

## Exported Interface
Public API defined in `__all__` (L8): `get_console`, `reconfigure`, `print`, `inspect`, `print_json`

## Critical Invariants
- Global `_console` remains None until first get_console() call
- reconfigure() preserves object identity while replacing internal state
- File parameter in print() creates isolated Console instance
